text: Ayekoo to H.E. the President, Vice President, First and Second Ladies of #Ghana for their exemplary leadership by taking the #COVID19 #vaccine. We congratulate the  @mohgovgh, @_GHSofficial, @moigovgh & partners on the roll-out of the campaign. @gavi @CEPI @WHOGhana @UNICEFGhana https://t.co/jnqrVm3FQ3
